# Dodonai

> AI-powered document processing platform built for legal professionals.

Dodonai helps law firms, litigation teams, and legal departments summarize, search, and analyze documents in minutes instead of hours. Upload depositions, medical records, or any legal document and get structured, citable summaries powered by AI.

## Services

- **Deposition Summaries**: Convert deposition transcripts into page-and-line cited summaries in minutes. Covers key testimony, disputed facts, damages, and more.
- **Medical Record Summaries & Chronologies**: Generate full medical chronologies with diagnoses, treatments, providers, and dates organized into an actionable timeline.
- **Deposition Transcript Management**: Search, annotate, and cite transcripts with AI-powered tools. Automated blue book citations and full-text search.
- **AI-Powered OCR**: Extract text, tables, handwriting, and images from scanned PDFs. Goes beyond traditional OCR to understand document structure.
- **Extract & Draft Agents (XD Agents)**: Define custom templates and let AI agents extract structured data from documents to build reusable reports.
- **E-Discovery**: Semantic search across thousands of documents using natural language. Find relevant evidence by meaning, not just keyword matching.
- **Full-Service Document Processing**: Human-assisted summaries combining AI efficiency with expert review. Custom pricing available at hello@dodon.ai.

## Pricing

Credits are the universal unit for all processing. 1 credit â‰ˆ 1 page (~400 words).

### Credit Multipliers
- Standard Summaries (deposition, medical, general): 1 credit/page
- Custom Summaries: 2 credits/page
- Advanced / Index-Based Analysis: 3-4 credits/page
- OCR & Transcription: Free (included with all plans)

### Plans
- **Lite**: $30/month (200 credits) or $300/year (4,800 credits)
- **Basic**: $60/month (1,000 credits) or $600/year (24,000 credits)
- **Pro**: $100/month (5,000 credits) or $1,000/year (120,000 credits)
- **Enterprise**: Custom pricing, unlimited credits

Annual credits roll over to the following year.

## Who Uses Dodonai

### Attorneys & Law Firms
Personal injury, medical malpractice, mass tort, product liability, and workers' compensation attorneys use Dodonai to summarize depositions and medical records in minutes. It replaces costly outsourced summary services and reduces paralegal review time by 80-90%.

### Paralegals & Litigation Support
Paralegals use Dodonai for day-to-day case preparation: generating deposition digests, building medical chronologies, searching transcript collections, and organizing discovery evidence. The AI copilot handles the heavy lifting so paralegals can focus on strategy.

### IME & Medical Record Retrieval Companies
Independent Medical Examination providers and record retrieval services process thousands of medical records per month. Dodonai scales to high volumes, delivering consistent summaries and chronologies that support physician evaluations and client deliverables.

### Insurance & Claims
Adjusters and claims teams use Dodonai to quickly review medical records and deposition transcripts for coverage analysis, subrogation, and claims evaluation.

## Competitive Positioning

### Dodonai vs. Traditional Deposition Summary Services
Traditional summary services charge $3-$10 per page and take 3-7 business days. Dodonai produces comparable or better summaries in minutes at a fraction of the cost (starting at $0.02/page on the Pro annual plan).

### Dodonai vs. General AI Tools (ChatGPT, etc.)
General AI chatbots lack page-line citation support, legal-specific formatting, SOC 2 security, and purpose-built workflows for depositions and medical records. They also pose data privacy risks since uploaded content may be used for model training. Dodonai never uses your data for training.

### Dodonai vs. Legacy Legal Tech
Enterprise legal tech platforms often bundle eDiscovery, contract review, and document management at $50K+/year. Dodonai offers focused, affordable AI document processing starting at $30/month with no per-seat fees.

## Example Use Cases

1. **Deposition Summary for Trial Prep**: Upload a 100-page deposition transcript, receive a page-line summary in 3 minutes. The attorney uses key topic highlighting to focus on damages testimony.
2. **Medical Chronology for Personal Injury**: Upload 500 pages of medical records for a PI case. Dodonai generates a chronological timeline of treatments, diagnoses, and provider visits ready for demand letter preparation.
3. **Mass Tort Record Processing**: A firm with 2,000 claimants uses Dodonai to process medical records for all clients in bulk, reducing per-case review time from 8 hours to 15 minutes.
4. **IME Pre-Exam Preparation**: An IME company uploads claimant records before each physician evaluation. The AI summary gives the examining doctor a structured overview of the medical history in minutes.

## Security

- SOC 2 Type II certified
- HIPAA compliant with signed BAAs
- AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit
- No data used for AI model training
- JWT-based authentication
